title: Retry build and deployment

requirements.text: Trigger a fresh build and deployment of the current project without making any code changes.
acceptanceCriteria: A new build is started using the current repository state.
No source files are modified as part of this request.
Deployment is attempted again and reports success or a clear failure reason.

constraints: Do not introduce any new features or code changes; this request is only to re-run the build/deployment pipeline.
Keep the project architecture and technology stack unchanged.
